document.full_text: fighting flared in gaza on thursday after a palestinian anti-tank missile hit an israeli school bus, wounding two, and israeli forces retaliated with planes and artillery, killing five palestinians.
document.title: fighting flares in gaza, shattering lull
lines_and_colors: fighting flared in gaza on thursday after a palestinian anti-tank missile hit an israeli school bus, wounding two, and israeli forces retaliated with planes and artillery, killing five palestinians.
